name: Nestrom Inc.
description: Operator of a field service management platform intended to streamline quality control, health, safety, and environmental operations. The company's platform provides a suite of modules for audits, inspections, corrective and preventive actions, maintenance tickets, and recurring checkups, enabling organizations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their quality and operations activities.
one_liner: Operator of a field service management platform intended to streamline quality control, health, safety, and environmental operations. The company's platform provides a suite of modules for audits, inspections, corrective and preventive actions, maintenance tickets, and recurring checkups, enabling organizations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their quality and operations activities.
